channel.title: Data Visualization World
channel.description: Recent content on Data Visualization World

item.title: Why should we set up this website?
item.description: With the increasing importance of data visualization in today’s world, there is a growing need for a platform that can help people learn and master this skill. Setting up a website dedicated to data visualization can be a great way to provide a platform for people to learn and share their knowledge. The website can be designed in a way that provides a comprehensive guide to data visualization. It can include tutorials, articles, and videos that cover various aspects of data visualization, such as choosing the right chart type, creating effective visualizations, and interpreting data.

item.title: 常用数据分析可视化图表解析之【Bar】

item.title: 常用数据分析可视化图表解析之【Pie】
item.description: “Yeah It’s on. ” 看懂数据可视化各种图–饼图，圆环图，南丁格尔玫瑰图 数据可视化有众多展现方式，不同的数据类型要选择适合的展现方法。

item.title: Istio v1aplha3 routing API介绍(译文）
item.description: 到目前为止，Istio提供了一个简单的API来进行流量管理，该API包括了四种资源：RouteRule，DestinationPolicy，EgressRule和Ingress（直接使用了Kubernets的Ingress资源）。借助此API，用户可以轻松管理Istio服务网格中的流量。该API允许用户将请求路由到特定版本的服务，为弹性测试注入延迟和失败，添加超时和断路器等等，所有这些功能都不必更改应用程序本身的代码。

About Me Hi, I am Su Wenjie, lecturer, graduated from the University of Pavia in Italy with a master’s degree in machine learning and data analysis. I am currently a full-time teacher at the School of Computer Engineering, serving as a major in big data management and application, specializing in three courses: “Python Programming”, “Data Structure and Algorithms (Python Language)”, and “Business Data Analysis”. Scientific research topics Provincial collaborative education
